translations: n.（房子或房间的）家具及室内陈设；供应，装备；服饰
v.为（房间或房屋）配备家具；提供，供应（furnish 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: No expense was spared in furnishing the new office.
sentences.translation: 装潢新办公室不惜工本。

sentences.sentence: IKEA focuses on the home furnishing business.
sentences.translation: 她说：“宜家专注于家居业务。

sentences.sentence: I saw some people inside furnishing the rooms.
sentences.translation: 我看到一些人在里面布置房间。
